name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The United States Postal Service announced on its official website on February 5 that it will resume accepting all international inbound mail and packages from China and Hong Kong Post. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjCSmRXbQAAV1j9.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 5, someone uploaded a video of White House spokesperson Levitt answering reporters' questions. Many netizens compared her with the spokesperson of the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs: "Confident and sunny, no need to have a stern face or flip answers"
"No need to pause for 40 seconds and then say I don't know the relevant situation"
"I understand everything she says in English, but I don't understand the Chinese we say in the same position" https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1887173342152859648/pu/img/b8L_yn76I3fsTQfH.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 5, Hegang, Heilongjiang. The man said he became disabled in an accident in 2008 and could only move his head. In 2012, he applied for government assistance because he had spent all his savings. The government cancelled the assistance in 2023, and the minimum living allowance in January 2024. At the end of last year, the government asked him to return 96,000 yuan in assistance over the years. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1887210788722786304/pu/img/6aP48GaiNhTVm1Cx.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
In the early morning of February 6, Yangzhong City, Jiangsu Province.
The rear windows of many cars on the city streets were smashed, and several "9.3 Anti-Fascist War Memorial Day" leaflets were stuffed into each car. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1887315951189651457/pu/img/Sxr4mB5jBR5gySUG.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Ma Yan, a 32-year-old Hui Christian pastor, will be tried on February 10 for "organizing an illegal gathering."
On August 9, 2024, the police raided a small gathering of Ma Yan and 10 other Christians at a guesthouse in Jinfeng District, Yinchuan City, Ningxia, and detained Ma Yan and three others. The other three were released within 10 days, but after Ma Yan was detained for 10 days, he was immediately detained again on suspicion of "organizing an illegal gathering" until today. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjEisXrXIAE7gsK.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 5, Dezhou, Shandong. The urban management asked a coffee shop owner to tear down the couplet posted outside the door on the grounds that it affected the city appearance. The urban management said that the wall belongs to the country, and you only have the right to use the shop, it is not your property. The owner retorted: Why don’t you say that the government propaganda slogans fixed on the wall affect the city appearance? 
The original video has been deleted by the platform. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1887393095345709056/pu/img/WZIt9bGbtWQ_VhTz.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the fifth anniversary of Dr. Li Wenliang's death, a blogger posted a post with a picture to mourn him, which was later deleted by the platform. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjF4ZBHaoAAm1k-.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 4, netizens shared their impressions of the movie "Nezha 2": "Shen Gongbao gives people the impression that he is the only college student in the family, the hope of the whole village, but he was shattered by the cruel reality of this society"
"Officials have assets starting from nine figures, and ordinary people can't earn nine figures in 10,000 years"
"Shen Gongbao is a civil servant after all, and we are just cannon fodder in Chentangguan" https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjF8LiFbAAApFR4.jpg
